title: Global Commodity Manager, Mechanical
description: As a Global Commodity Manager, you will be responsible for all aspects of supplier development and ongoing performance management regarding Google's technology and business needs...
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or equivalent practical experience. 10 years of experience in commodity management or supply chain management. Experience with sheet metal, plastic process, and materials.
preferred_qualifications: MBA or Master's degree in Engineering or a related field. 5 years of commodity management experience in mechanicals. Knowledge of analytical skills (i.e. cost modeling, quotation analysis, roadmap development, supplier selection/performance, planning processes). Ability to operate in a fast-paced and changing environment. Excellent communication, written, and leadership skills with the ability to assume a leadership role with cross-functional peers.
responsibilities: Develop long-term sourcing strategies for Mechanicals hardware (e.g., Mechanical Racks, Shelves, Assemblies) and implement supply chain improvements. Manage supplier relationships and performance in technology alignment, cost, quality, and delivery. Maintain industry knowledge and keep stakeholders aware of supplier and market conditions. Lead cross-functional teams through supplier selection process for new platforms. Conduct high-level negotiations and secure comprehensive agreements with supplier executives.
